title: Why is Heimerdinger STILL bugged?
body:
This is the 3rd time I've posted about this, with countless other posts from other Heimerdinger players.
Finally, I have video accompaniment.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wa15HYLB0yU

replies.body: I can confirm this bug happening for me, too! In addition, a couple of times the turrets have continued to fire across the map in a weird sort of heat-seeking missile style (happened in ARAM), although they didn't do any damage (but seeing it flying at you was still scary, since you didn't know the true range).
some minions have auto attack bugs like this :/ azirs soldiers do the same type of thing but just lunges their spears

I've seen this too.  I don't play Heimer much, but the few times I've been against one I've seen the projectiles go flying across the map to 'hit' random enemy champions.  To my knowledge, they don't do damage, but it still shouldn't happen.

but this one is always fun :D also for the first "bug" the turrets didnt drop agro, she was out of range of the smaller turrets (not the bigger one) and the turrets will work on a  basis of 

>attack what heimy is attacking
>if heimy is attacking nothing protect the donger and attacked whatever is attacking him!
>if nothing is attacking heimy, attack closest non friendly unit we have vision on
(the first one she ran out of range of the smaller turret so it went for minions whilst the bigger one focused her)

Happened to me once. I was playing Rengar and ulted whiled running away from Hiemer (don't judge, it was a first time Rengar), and his turrets were 1. still targeting me even though I was invisible and 2. hitting me with missiles even though I was at least more than 2000 units away. The missiles weren't doing any damage to me, but still freaked me out a little.

Some programmer at Riot needs to simply delete any and all code associated with the AI for Heimer's turrets and rebuild it from scratch. There are way too many corner cases, rare bugs, and odd interactions for tweaking the existing code to be effective.
Oh wow.... that's game changing. They should have fixed this a while ago (I thought they did). I guess that explains why I don't see the DONGER very much
I've seen the third one quite frequently. Quite frustrating, I must say.
Any Red please...
Even when a thread gets this much attention, Riot *still* ignores it.  That's so very sad ...
